post.title: Millie Parfait and Mysta Rias Won‚Äôt Be Able to Participate in NIJIFes 2022
post.content:
Nijisanji announced that EN talents Millie Parfait (Obsydia) and Mysta Rias (Luxiem) will not be able to make it to the Open Stage of Nijisanji Fes 2022 set for the weekend of October 1 and 2 at Makuhari Messe Exhibition Hall 1 to 5.

The agency explained that unforeseen circumstances led to the said cancellation. The talents were set to join their Nijisanji EN colleagues at the Open Stage event, which will be broadcast on Nijisanji's YouTube channel.

„ÄêNotice: Regarding EN Liver's participation in #NIJIFes2022„Äë

We regret to inform you that @MillieParfait and @Mysta_Rias will be unable to participate in NIJIFes due to unforeseen circumstances.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding. https://t.co/GiKtjQ0ADm

— NIJISANJI EN Official (@NIJISANJI_World) August 29, 2022

Millie assured her fans in a tweet that there will be more opportunities in the future, asking everyone to cheer the rest of the Nijisanji members who are going to participate.

I can't participate this time, but there will be more opportunities in the future, so please don't be too sad about the news! üíñ let's all cheer everyone who is going to be participating instead ü•≥üíñ https://t.co/cLNA8sSxPw

— Millie Parfait ü™Ñ NIJISANJI EN (@MillieParfait) August 29, 2022

Banner Photo via YouTube (1, 2)

post.description: An announcement from Nijisanji on Twitter says they will be unable to participate in NIJIFes due to unforeseen circumstances

node.description: A few weeks ago, we reported that AniManGaki 2022, one of the biggest annual anime/cosplay/gaming events in Malaysia, will showcase 80 VTubers.
